pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. COVER PAGE A000
pages.page_overview_summary: This cover page provides perspective views of the Malcolm Crescent Townhomes Block 'A'. It includes four different perspective views from various angles, providing a visual overview of the building's exterior design. The title block indicates the project name and location.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. CONSTRUCTION NOTES A001
pages.general_notes_verbatim: GENERAL NOTES: 1. CONSTRUCTION DRAWINGS... (truncated for brevity)
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet contains extensive construction notes, general notes, and abbreviations relevant to the entire project. It serves as a reference for understanding the symbols and terminology used throughout the drawings. The hatching legend provides details on material representations.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. BUILDING CODE PLANS & ELEVATIONS A002
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet includes the ground floor plan and various building elevations, along with a building code matrix. It provides a comprehensive overview of the building's layout and compliance with local building codes. The elevations show the exterior views from different sides.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. DOOR/WINDOW SCHEDULE & CONSTRUCTION ASSEMBLIES A003
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides detailed schedules for doors and hardware, along with construction assemblies for walls and roofs. It includes specific details for masonry, foundation, and interior wall assemblies, as well as notes on door and window installations.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. FOUNDATION PLAN A200
pages.page_overview_summary: The foundation plan sheet details the layout of the building's foundation, including thickened slabs and strip footings. It includes schedules for strip footings and built-up posts, providing essential information for constructing the foundation system.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. GROUND FLOOR PLAN A201
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet presents the ground floor plan, showing the layout of rooms and spaces within the building. It includes detailed dimensions and a lintel schedule, providing critical information for the construction of the ground floor structure.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. ROOF PLAN A202
pages.page_overview_summary: The roof plan sheet illustrates the layout of the roof structure, including dimensions and notes specific to the roof design. It provides essential information for the construction and installation of the roofing system.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. REFLECTED CEILING PLAN A220
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides the reflected ceiling plan for the ground floor, showing the arrangement of ceiling elements and lighting fixtures. It is crucial for the installation of electrical and lighting systems within the building.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. EXTERIOR ELEVATIONS A300
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet displays the exterior elevations of the building, providing views from the south, north, east, and west. It includes detailed dimensions and notes on exterior finishes, essential for understanding the building's external appearance.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. BUILDING & WALL SECTIONS A400
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet contains detailed building and wall sections, including long and short sections. It provides critical information on the vertical construction elements and is essential for understanding the building's structural integrity.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block: MALCOLM CRESCENT TOWNHOMES BLOCK 'A' LISTOWEL, ON. STANDARD DETAILS A500
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides standard construction details, including fire-rated assemblies and foundation to brick wall details. It includes notes on fire blocking, which are crucial for ensuring compliance with fire safety regulations.
